nodes.text: Shilmer's syndrome was a degenerative malady that could consume the limbs and vocal cords of those it affected. After Interstellar Thorilide Guild inspector Lemuel Tharsa caught that disease, he recreated himself as the mogul Denetrius Vidian. Later, Vidian's death as a result of his treasonous actions against the Galactic Empire during the Gorse conflict was covered up as a relapse of the disease.
